alert.note: Alert for Brookings (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 19 at 1:55PM MDT until July 19 at 2:15PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BROOKINGS COUNTY... At 255 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bruce, or 9 miles southeast of Estelline, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 250 pm quarter size hail was reported in Bruce. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... White around 305 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
